rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. 
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you're ancient, up to one target land you control becomes a 4/4 green Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. [i](You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)[/i]
